## General feeling of unsafety in Friesland

```{r, echo = FALSE}
dat <- read.csv("_On_veiligheidsbeleving__regio__24112021_093915.csv", sep = ";", header = F)
dat <- dat[6,c(3:ncol(dat))]

dat <- as.data.frame(t(dat))
colnames(dat) <- "Unsafety"
dat$year <- c("2012", "2013", "2014", "2015", "2016", "2017", "2019")
dat$Unsafety <- gsub(",", ".", dat$Unsafety)
dat$Unsafety <- as.numeric(dat$Unsafety)

p <- ggplot(dat, aes(x = year, y = Unsafety, fill = year)) +
  geom_col() +
  ylim(c(0,31))

ggplotly(p)
```

## Statistics about Friesland

```{r echo = FALSE}
municipalities <- c("Achtkarspelen", "Ameland", "Dantumadeel/Dantumadiel", "De Friese Meren/De Fryske Marren", "Harlingen", "Heerenveen", "Leeuwarden", "Noardeast-Fryslân", "Ooststellingwerf", "Opsterland", "Schiermonnikoog", "Smallingerland", "Súdwest-Fryslân", "Terschelling", "Tietjerksteradeel/Tytsjerksteradiel", "Vlieland", "Waadhoeke", "Weststellingwerf")
residents <- c(27875, 3785, 18977, 51856, 15878, 50859, 124639, 45431, 25566, 29847, 937, 55896, 90138, 4894, 32166, 1226, 46327, 26209)
sizes <- c(102.23, 59.11, 84.66, 351.29, 24.96, 190.09, 238.38, 377.83, 223.42, 224.40, 40.50, 117.31, 523.01, 85.26, 148.86, 39.15, 284.86, 220.30)

friesland_dat <- data.frame("Municipality" = municipalities, "Number of residents" = residents, "Size in m2" = sizes)
datatable(friesland_dat, options = list(pageLength = 5), caption = "Municipalities in Friesland")
```

## A meaningful equation

<script type="text/javascript"
        src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/mathjax/2.7.0/MathJax.js?config=TeX-AMS_CHTML"></script>

$$
\begin{aligned}
\bar{y}_{residents} &= \frac{\sum^{n}_{i = 1}y_i}{N}\\
&= \frac{652506}{18}\\
&= 36250.33
\end{aligned}
$$
